entities.name: aunt petunia
entities.description: Aunt Petunia is mentioned as the one who has a surgically clean kitchen and is talking calmly about Lord Voldemort to Uncle Vernon.

entities.name: lord voldemort
entities.description: Lord Voldemort is mentioned as the topic of conversation between Aunt Petunia and Uncle Vernon.

entities.name: uncle vernon
entities.description: Uncle Vernon is mentioned as the one who is talking to Aunt Petunia about Lord Voldemort.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as the one whose two lives have become fused and everything has been turned upside down.

entities.name: dementors
entities.description: Dementors are mentioned as the ones that have caused a breach in the invisible wall between the non-magical world of Privet Drive and the magical world beyond.

entities.name: albus dumbledore
entities.description: Albus Dumbledore is mentioned as someone Mrs. Figg knows.

entities.name: mrs figg
entities.description: Mrs. Figg is mentioned as the one who knows Albus Dumbledore.

entities.name: hogwarts
entities.description: Hogwarts is mentioned as a place Harry might never go back to.

relationships.description: Aunt Petunia and Uncle Vernon are discussing Lord Voldemort.
Harry might never go back to Hogwarts.
